title: Update regarding Stratos Defense
story_body:
Stratos Defense Inc. (STR) has announced the following routine updates.

As of 08:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT), Stratos Defense Inc. has confirmed the appointment of Ms. Emily J. Wilson as Director of Marketing, effective immediately. Ms. Wilson will be responsible for leading the company's marketing efforts and developing strategic marketing initiatives.

In a separate development, Stratos Defense Inc. has launched a new corporate social responsibility (CSR) webpage on its official website, accessible at https://www.stratosdefense.com/csr. The webpage provides information on the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) practices and policies.

Additionally, Stratos Defense Inc. has announced that it will participate in the upcoming annual shareholders' meeting, scheduled to take place on Wednesday, May 17, 2023, at 10:00 AM EDT. The meeting will be held at the company's headquarters, located at 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

No further information is available at this time.
